    • Method Detail

      • rand

        public static OTUtil.RandOutput rand(DlogGroup dlog,
                     GroupElement w,
                     GroupElement x,
                     GroupElement y,
                     GroupElement z,
                     java.security.SecureRandom random)
        Some OT protocols uses the function RAND(w,x,y,z). This function defined as follows.

        1. SAMPLE random values s,t <- {0, . . . , q-1}

        2. COMPUTE u = w^s * y^t

        3. COMPUTE v = x^s * z^t

        4. OUTPUT (u,v)

        Parameters:
        w -
        x -
        y -
        z -
